type.description: Type of synced ability (kill, revive etc.)

partner_rig.description: Animation rig type of the receiver this ability matches.

ability_id.description: The ability to run when executing the sync kill or death.

weapon_type.description: Must match the weapon carried by the receiver for the pair to be played.

emote_type.description: [string]Must match the emote currently waiting for by the initiator to be played.

seater_role.description: Must match the role of the receiver for the pair to be played, except if set to None which works as a wildcard.

lerp_duration.description: Length of the lerp phase, in seconds.

skip_lerp.description: [bool]Should we ignore lerping while doing this synced ability?

distance.description: Distance from root of enemy to lerp the entity to.

range.description: Range for this ability to be active.

camera_override.description: [bool]Overrides the camera with the avatar rig camera node. Only used if entity is an avatar.

override_motion.description: [bool]Overrides the various motion components, such as 'motion', 'rotation' and 'locomotion'.

attach_node.description: [string]Name of the node where to attach the receiver.
